description:
Super tenacious. Double-thick adhesive sticks firmly to irregular surfaces like wood, stone and brick. Just the thing for when you discover a rip, crack or break.

  • Strong reinforced backing and tough all-weather
  • Creates a semi-permanent repair
  • For best results apply at room temperature on dust-free surfaces
  • Easily tears by hand
name: Gorilla Repair Tape Roll 48mm x 8.2m
